entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 58 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
